Mario
A quantum plumber, capable of altering reality with his mustache.
He masters time-jumping, sometimes leaving small parallel universes in his pipes.
Luigi
The eternal second, with a secret ability to communicate with ghosts.
He can summon an astral air current, ideal for gliding and avoiding the most viscous enemies.
Peach
A princess, yes, but also an expert in the science of floral distraction.
Generates force fields of cherry blossoms, making her almost untouchable on a sunny day.
Toad
A mycologist with the ability to grow surprise-effect mushrooms.
He is able to spread spores that alter the perception of his rivals and make them move slower.
